text: John Spicer (died 26 December 1623), of Pease Lane, Dorchester, Dorset, was an English politician and tailor. ==Family== He married Thomasine Read and they had two sons, including Walter Spicer. ==Career== He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Dorchester in 1604.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1604-1629/member/spicer- john-1623 ==References== Category:16th-century births Category:1623 deaths Category:Members of the Parliament of England for Dorchester Category:English MPs 1604–1611
title: John Spicer (died 1623)
